caption.p: MAPKs‐dependent macrophage activation by HMR. RAW264.7 cells were pretreated with PD98059 (40 μM), SB203580 (40 μM), SP900125 (40 μM), BAY 11–7082 (40 μM), or LY294002 (40 μM) for 2 hr and then co‐treated with HMR (50 μg/ml) for 24 hr. mRNA level was investigated using RT‐PCR. * p < .05 compared to the cells without each inhibitor
